ssl::verify_mode

Bitmask type for peer verification. 

typedef int verify_mode;

Possible values are:

  • ssl::verify_none
  • ssl::verify_peer
  • ssl::verify_fail_if_no_peer_cert
  • ssl::verify_client_once
Requirements

Header: boost/asio/ssl/verify_mode.hpp

Convenience header: boost/asio/ssl.hpp
